content.description:
From the right side of the prominent ledge at the base of the cliff climb up to a bolt on good holds (a fall before clipping that first bolt would not be good).  move up to a second bolt, then a third bolt and left leaning ramp (optional small gear).  pass a 4th bolt and some thin face moves then head up past a 5th bolt and right facing easy corner (optional sm. to med. pro) toward the prominent tree (cord/sling anchor).

This route feels a little PG, being solid at the grade helps.

The first 2/3 of this route is very nice, the end is a bit chossy.
content.protection: 5 bolts, optional sm.-med. pro, sling anchor on tree
content.location: Right side of prominent flat ledge at base of cliff.

content.description:
On the right side of the prominent ledge at the base of the cliff climb up to the first bolt (shared with Unknown A).  A fall before clipping the first bolt would not be good and some may want to clip the second bolt of Unknown A before traversing to the left (watch rope drag).  Traverse left and up (first crux) to a short, shallow corner.  Move up to a tenuous slab (second crux, height dependent), then finish via the same right facing flakes/corner as Unknown A or take the somewhat mungy crack to the left (opt. pro) to the prominent tree anchor.

The first 2/3 of this route is very nice, the end is a bit chossy.
content.protection: 7 bolts, sling anchor on tree, optional sm. to med. gear
content.location: Right side of prominent flat ledge at base of cliff.
